resources.string: - Use interface below to create events that you can keep count of the number of times you have done them (hereafter called Countables)
- On this screen you can also delete (via swiping away Countable rows), sort (via the menu icon) and reorder Countables (via the green drag and drop indicator at the beginning of the row)
- To interact with and change a Countable simply click on it
